title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is displayed. The expected behavior is that a menu should appear, allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
EB: The expected behavior is that when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should be displayed, providing options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
